description: This Java class defines a REST controller for authentication-related endpoints: user registration and login, issuing JWT tokens. It handles HTTP POST requests to '/register' and '/login' URLs, interacts with user repository, security manager, and JWT service to authenticate users and create new accounts.

classes.name: AuthController
classes.description: REST controller providing authentication endpoints for user registration and login, managing JWT tokens.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Handles user registration by creating a new user record, assigning roles, and returning a JWT token.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates user credentials and issues a JWT token upon success.
